comment.author: 86730902@N02
comment._content: Is this church still in existance?

comment.author: 26491575@N05
comment._content: Dear Hoganha, Thanks for your question. According to the below publication, the church was rebuilt in 1921 and is now a private residence: www.blurb.com/bookstore/detail/2218722 Please let us know if you have any additional questions!
